Message:
If fork()ing, parent process must close child's socket fd. Child close() is not sufficient as both parent and child have a reference to the same socket fd, and fd will never be free'd if close() is not called from both processes. #MsgLength=230

Message:
Use non-blocking I/O on non-SFTP session to avoid unnecessary waiting for data during reads. With multiple threads, libssh2 reads will call poll() to wait for available data, one read will handle ALL data, while the other read comes up dry. #MsgLength=241
